description.value:
Your war pig bodychecks your enemies, leaving them numb from the impact. Until the start of your next turn, Strikes you make that deal damage to a creature within your war pig's reach make the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} until the end of your next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-effects.Item.EutUqr7s9d9bRy9b]{Effect: War Pig Support Benefit}

publication.title: Pathfinder Adventure Path #208: Hoof, Cinder, and Storm
